member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.API
member.summary:
Rfam is a database of structure-annotated multiple sequence alignments, convariance models And family annotation For a number Of non-coding RNA, cis-regulatory And self - splicing intron families. Rfam 12.0 contains 2450 families.The seed alignments are hand curated And aligned using available sequence And Structure data, And covariance models are built from these alignments Using the INFERNAL 1.1 software suite (http://infernal.janelia.org). The full regions list Is created by searching the RFAMSEQ database (described below) Using the covariance model, And Then listing all hits above a family specific threshold To the model. Rfam 12.0 annotates 19,623,515 regions In the RFAMSEQ database.
Rfam Is maintained by a consortium Of researchers at the EMBL European Bioinformatics Institute, Hinxton, UK And the Howard Huges Medical Institute, Janelia Farm Research Campus, Ashburn, Virginia, USA. We are very keen To hear any feedback, positive Or negative, that you may have On Rfam - please contact rfam-help@ebi.ac.uk.
Rfam Is freely available And In the Public domain under the Creative Commons Zero licence. See ftp://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/Rfam/CURRENT/COPYING for more information.

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm
member.summary:
Rfam.seed
Stockholm format is a Multiple sequence alignment format used by Pfam and Rfam to disseminate protein and RNA sequence alignments. The alignment editors Ralee and Belvu support Stockholm format as do the probabilistic database search tools, Infernal and HMMER, and the phylogenetic analysis tool Xrate.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.AC
member.summary: Accession number: Accession number In form PFxxxxx (Pfam) Or RFxxxxx (Rfam).

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.ID
member.summary: Identification: One word name For family.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.DE
member.summary: Definition Short description of family.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.AU
member.summary: Author Authors of the entry.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.SE
member.summary: Source Of seed The source suggesting the seed members belong To one family.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.SS
member.summary: Source Of Structure The source(prediction Or publication) Of the consensus RNA secondary Structure used by Rfam.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.BM
member.summary: Build method Command line used To generate the model

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.SM
member.summary: Search method Command line used To perform the search

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.GA
member.summary: Gathering threshold Search threshold To build the full alignment.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.TC
member.summary: Trusted Cutoff Lowest sequence score (And domain score For Pfam) Of match In the full alignment.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.NC
member.summary: Noise Cutoff Highest sequence score (And domain score For Pfam) Of match Not In full alignment.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.TP
member.summary: Type Type of family -- presently Family, Domain, Motif Or Repeat for Pfam. -- a tree with roots Gene, Intron Or Cis-reg for Rfam.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.SQ
member.summary: Sequence Number of sequences in alignment.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.DC
member.summary: Database Comment: Comment about database reference.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.DR
member.summary: Database Reference: Reference to external database.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.RC
member.summary: Reference Comment: Comment about literature reference.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.RN
member.summary: Reference Number: Reference Number.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.RM
member.summary: Reference Medline: Eight digit medline UI number.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.RT
member.summary: Reference Title: Reference Title.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.RA
member.summary: Reference Author: Reference Author

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.RL
member.summary: Reference Location: Journal location.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.PI
member.summary: Previous identifier: Record of all previous ID lines.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.KW
member.summary: Keywords : Keywords.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.CC
member.summary: Comment : Comments.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.NE
member.summary: Pfam accession: Indicates a nested domain.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.NL
member.summary: Location : Location of nested domains - sequence ID, start And end of insert.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.WK
member.summary: Wikipedia link: Wikipedia page

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.CL
member.summary: Clan: Clan accession

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.MB
member.summary: Membership : Used for listing Clan membership

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.NH
member.summary: New Hampshire A tree In New Hampshire eXtended format.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.TN
member.summary: Tree ID A unique identifier For the Next tree.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.FR
member.summary: False discovery Rate: A method used To Set the bit score threshold based On the ratio Of expected false positives to true positives. Floating point number between 0 And 1.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Data.Xfam.Rfam.Stockholm.CB
member.summary: Calibration method: Command line used To calibrate the model (Rfam only, release 12.0 And later)
